testcase.system-out: Given Initiate manage cart..................................................passed When user scrolls to Apple MacBook Pro 13-inch and clicks Add to cart Button.passed And enter quantity of "2" and click on ADD TO CART Button and open cart.....passed Then the product "Apple MacBook Pro 13-inch" is added successfully to the cart.passed

testcase.name: user enters valid info and the cart has at least one item
testcase.system-out: Given initiate checkout.....................................................passed When user navigates to cart page............................................passed And confirm the terms and click checkout button.............................passed And select the country "Egypt", city "Cairo", address1 "El Nozha", zip "12345", number "01559950234" and click Continue.passed And select the next day air shipping methode and click continue.............passed And select the check payment method and click continue......................passed And check the order email "moRajab@gmail.com", number "01559950234" and click confirm.passed Then the order is placed successfully.......................................passed
